document.full_text: israeli shipping mogul sammy ofer, whose business empire is at the center of a scandal over trade with iran, has died after a long illness, a family representative said on friday.
document.title: elderly israeli tycoon in iran scandal dies
lines_and_colors: israeli shipping mogul sammy ofer, whose business empire is at the center of a scandal over trade with iran, has died after a long illness, a family representative said on friday.
